name: Feelings Not Yet
description:
You’re playing as a character that has the power to see people’s loneliness.

You, Nyxie, and your coworker Stephan are the only two who can see the monsters that track people in despair.

Probe people’s spirit, watch their relations and pierce through minds to flush out their feeling of loneliness.

This is a game with a good amount of narrative and is playable only with a mouse. You can play it from the game’s page within your browser.
